page.title: 19ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: The pupils and staff of LOCHALSH PRIMARY SCHOOL, Auchtertyre, Balmacara, wish to thank all the various people who helped in any way to compile those few pages. Special thanks to ___ GEORGE SINCLAIR for photographs. For pages of text and data-counts we acknowledge contributions by_ STUART WHITTLE,SHONA GLEN-RIDDELL, FIONA STEWART,ZOE THOMAS, BEN BELL, STEVEN MACRAE, MARY-CLAIRE MACCOLL ANGELA GORDON,DAWN LUPTON,HEATHER MACLEOD,RUPERT LENG,JOANNA CLARE, MELISSA CLARE,MARY GILLESPIE,ANDREW VOISEY,MICHAEL MATHESON and JASON MATHESON. THANK YOU_BEST WISHES LOCHALSH PRIMARY SCHOOL
